question_text:
Question 11
In an urban area, a median is provided to separate the opposing streams of traffic. As per IRC : 86-1983, 
the desirable minimum width (in m, expressed as integer) of the median, is _______.
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
As per IRC : 86-1983
Desirable minimum width of median in urban roads = 5 m
